verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* weary \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w let|strong="H5315"\w* go \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w speech|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w myself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*: \w Do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* thou judgest \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w so|strong="H7378"\w*.

Doth \w it|strong="H5921"\w* seem \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou shouldst calumniate \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* work \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy own \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* help \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*?

Hast thou \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: \w or|strong="H0518"\w*, shalt thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* seeth?

\w Are|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* thou shouldst \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* shouldst \w know|strong="H1847"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w done|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7561"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, whereas \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H0369"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* me, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w fashioned|strong="H6213"\w* me wholly \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* dost thou thus cast me \w down|strong="H3027"\w* headlong \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3027"\w* sudden?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* clay, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thou wilt \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

Hast thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* milked \w me|strong="H3808"\w* as \w milk|strong="H2461"\w*, \w and|strong="H2461"\w* curdled \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w cheese|strong="H2461"\w*?

Thou hast \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* me \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: thou hast \w put|strong="H3847"\w* me together \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w sinews|strong="H1517"\w*:

Thou hast granted \w me|strong="H5978"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w and|strong="H7307"\w* mercy, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* thy visitation hath \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Although|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w conceal|strong="H6845"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w in|strong="H0428"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou rememberest \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w and|strong="H2398"\w* thou hast spared \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w an|strong="H8104"\w* hour: \w why|strong="H3808"\w* dost thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* suffer \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* clean \w from|strong="H5352"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*?

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7561"\w*, \w woe|strong="H0480"\w* unto \w me|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w just|strong="H6663"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w being|strong="H7646"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H7646"\w* affliction \w and|strong="H7218"\w* misery.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H7725"\w* pride thou wilt \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H6679"\w* \w a|strong="H6381"\w* lioness, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* thou tormentest \w me|strong="H7725"\w* wonderfully.

Thou renewest thy \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*, \w and|strong="H6635"\w* multipliest thy wrath upon \w me|strong="H5978"\w*, \w and|strong="H6635"\w* pains \w war|strong="H6635"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5978"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* didst thou \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*: \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* consumed \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* might \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*!

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* should \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w*, \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fewness \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ended shortly? suffer \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, therefore, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* lament \w my|strong="H4480"\w* sorrow \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*:

\w Before|strong="H2962"\w* \w I|strong="H2962"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* covered \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* mist \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*:

\w A|strong="H3644"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* misery \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6757"\w*, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6757"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w order|strong="H5468"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* everlasting horror dwelleth.
